articles.title: Israel-Iran Tensions Highlights: S Jaishankar Speaks To Iranian, Israeli Counterparts, Discusses West Asia Situation - NDTV
articles.description: Israel-Iran Conflict Live Updates: Iran launched more than 300 drones and missiles at Israel in an unprecedented attack late Saturday, the Israeli army announced, in a major escalation of the long-running covert war between the regional foes.
articles.content:
